About.name: Rob Sutcliffe
About.personal summary: Front-End Developer with expertise in data visualisation, full-stack development, and UI/UX design history. With a proven track record of transforming prototypes into production-ready codebases, delivering responsive data visualisations, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

This Site: I built this website using Processing.js, framer Motion.js, Next.js and Tailwind CSS. I made it so people can easily find the details they want to know about me without having to search trhough all my profiles. I like the animated circles.

Projects.title: Language Learning with Video App
Projects.description: A Strapi and Next.js application with scraping, fuzzy search, and a custom video player. Its features include JWT OAuth, fuzzy search, and a daily cron job to mirror existing databases and images. It allows teachers to find and adapt video clips from foreign language films, add questions, and set them for homework. Teachers can upload and share worksheets that relate to the lessons.
